sentences.chinese: 科内特的律师杰克·约翰斯顿说，这颗牙“看起来像是某种食草的啮齿类动物的牙。”

sentences.english: 'Chewing is a property which no large herbivorous terrestrial mammal has got rid of, ' said Professor Martin Sander, from Bonn University.
sentences.chinese: “现在，没有大型陆生食草哺乳动物是不需要咀嚼的，”波恩大学的马丁·桑德教授说。

sentences.english: The camel is a herbivorous animal.
sentences.chinese: 骆驼是一种食草动物。

detailed_translations.english: Herbivorous animals only eat plants

name: scent
trans: n.香味;香水;气息;察觉v.嗅出;使充满气味;觉察出;

sentences.english: a yellow rose with a lovely scent
sentences.chinese: 香气怡人的黄玫瑰

detailed_translations.english: a pleasant smell that something has

sentences.english: The money will be used for teacher training schemes.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将用于教师培训计划。

sentences.english: a pension scheme
sentences.chinese: 退休金计划

sentences.english: a get-rich-quick scheme
sentences.chinese: 快速致富的手段

detailed_translations.english: an official plan that is intended to help people in some way, for example by providing education or training

sentences.english: Times Square attracts more than 30 million visitors annually.
sentences.chinese: 时代广场每年吸引三千多万游客。

detailed_translations.chinese: 访问者，参观者；视察者；候鸟
detailed_translations.english: someone who comes to visit a place or a person

sentences.english: bathroom tiles
sentences.chinese: 浴室瓷砖

detailed_translations.english: a flat square piece of baked clay or other material, used for covering walls, floors etc

sentences.english: Using a seatbelt will reduce the likelihood of serious injury in a car accident.
sentences.chinese: 系安全带可以降低在车祸中受重伤的可能性。

detailed_translations.english: the degree to which something can reasonably be expected to happen

sentences.english: There were several possibilities open to each manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 每个制造商都可以有几种不同的选择。

detailed_translations.english: A possibility is one of several different things that could be done.

sentences.english: Danger! No boats beyond this point.
sentences.chinese: 危险！船只不可越过此处。

sentences.english: The refugees believe that their lives are in danger .
sentences.chinese: 难民认为他们有生命危险。

detailed_translations.english: the possibility that someone or something will be harmed, destroyed, or killed

sentences.english: the disposal of hazardous waste
sentences.chinese: 有害废弃物的处理

detailed_translations.english: dangerous, especially to people’s health or safety

sentences.english: rings made of pure gold
sentences.chinese: 纯金制成的戒指

sentences.english: Our beef patties are 100% pure.
sentences.chinese: 我们的牛肉饼是100%的纯牛肉。

sentences.english: His motives were pure.
sentences.chinese: 他动机纯正。

detailed_translations.english: not mixed with anything else; with nothing added

sentences.english: Can you repeat your question?
sentences.chinese: 你能重复一遍你的问题吗？

sentences.english: Sorry - could you repeat that?
sentences.chinese: 对不起——你能再说一遍吗？

sentences.english: It is not, I repeat not, my fault.
sentences.chinese: 那不是我的错，我再说一遍，不是。

sentences.english: It was a terrible journey - I hope we don’t have a repeat performance (= have the same thing happen again ) on the way home.
sentences.chinese: 这一路上太糟糕了——我希望回程可不要再发生同样的事。

detailed_translations.english: to say or write something again
an event that is very like something that happened before

sentences.english: The magazine is unable to enter into any correspondence on medical matters.
sentences.chinese: 本杂志无法答复有关医学方面的来信。

sentences.english: All correspondence between us must cease.
sentences.chinese: 我们之间的所有通信必须停止。

detailed_translations.english: the process of sending and receiving letters

sentences.english: I got a letter from Melanie today.
sentences.chinese: 今天我收到梅拉妮的一封信。

sentences.english: There are 26 letters in the English alphabet.
sentences.chinese: 英语字母表有26个字母。

detailed_translations.english: a written or printed message that is usually put in an envelope and sent by mail

name: unanimous
trans: adj.全体一致的;一致同意的;无异议的;

sentences.english: It was decided by a unanimous vote that the school should close.
sentences.chinese: 关闭学校是大家一致通过的决定。

sentences.english: The decision to appoint Matt was almost unanimous.
sentences.chinese: 任命马特的决定几乎是一致通过的。

detailed_translations.english: a unanimous decision, vote, agreement etc is one in which all the people involved agree

sentences.english: What's the depth of the water here?
sentences.chinese: 这儿的水有多深？

sentences.english: the depth of her love
sentences.chinese: 她那爱之深

sentences.english: Astronomers may one day travel to the depths of space.
sentences.chinese: 天文学家也许有一天可以到太空深处去。

detailed_translations.english: the distance from the top or surface to the bottom of sth

sentences.english: The president has already given his approval to the plan.
sentences.chinese: 总统已经批准了这个计划。

sentences.english: It is just three months since we received official approval to go ahead with the project.
sentences.chinese: 三个月前我们刚刚得到正式批准进行这个项目。

sentences.english: A company cannot be sold without the approval of the shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 没有股东的同意不能出售公司。

sentences.english: The bill will be submitted for approval by Congress.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案将提交国会通过。

sentences.english: The President would appoint the Council of Ministers, subject to the approval of the National Assembly.
sentences.chinese: 总统将任命内阁成员，但需经国民议会批准。

sentences.english: The IMF has given its seal of approval to the government’s economic strategy.
sentences.chinese: 国际货币基金组织已经同意该政府的经济策略。

sentences.english: appointments requiring parliamentary approval
sentences.chinese: 需经议会批准的任命

sentences.english: She looked to Greg for approval.
sentences.chinese: 她指望格雷格同意。

detailed_translations.english: when a plan, decision, or person is officially accepted

sentences.english: Gillian and Darren greeted the speakers with great enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 吉利恩和达伦非常热情地接待了演讲者。

sentences.english: We went along to the local diving club, full of enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 我们兴高采烈地去了当地的潜水俱乐部。

sentences.english: They go about their tasks with little enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 他们执行任务时没多大干劲。

sentences.english: A delay of two hours did not dampen their enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 耽误了两小时没有减弱他们的热情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 热情， 热心， 热忱； 巨大兴趣
detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of interest and enjoyment about something and an eagerness to be involved in it

sentences.english: Her voice was full of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 她的声音充满了激情。

sentences.english: She was good at hiding her emotions.
sentences.chinese: 她很会掩饰自己的情感。

sentences.english: Kim received the news without showing any visible sign of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 金接到消息时丝毫不露声色。

detailed_translations.english: a strong human feeling such as love, hate, or anger

sentences.english: circus performers
sentences.chinese: 马戏演员

sentences.english: He was a better songwriter than performer.
sentences.chinese: 他更擅长写歌，而不是演唱。

detailed_translations.english: an actor, musician etc who performs to entertain people

sentences.english: I’ve been so miserable since Pat left me.
sentences.chinese: 自从帕特离我而去后，我十分痛苦。

sentences.english: I spent the weekend feeling miserable .
sentences.chinese: 我那个周末心情很糟糕。

sentences.english: Jan looks really miserable .
sentences.chinese: 简看上去很痛苦。

sentences.english: Why do you make yourself miserable by taking on too much work?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么揽这么多活儿，把自己弄得很辛苦呢？

detailed_translations.english: extremely unhappy, for example because you feel lonely, cold, or badly treated

name: craft
trans: n.工艺;手艺;诡计;行业;小船;艇;航空器v.精心制作;

sentences.english: traditional rural crafts
sentences.chinese: 传统的乡村手工艺

sentences.english: arts and crafts
sentences.chinese: 手工艺

detailed_translations.english: a job or activity in which you make things with your hands, and that you usually need skill to do
to make something using a special skill, especially with your hands

sentences.english: He had dared to speak out against injustice, and overnight he became a national hero .
sentences.chinese: 他敢于站出来抨击不公正的现象，一夜之间就成了国家英雄。

sentences.english: His father was a war hero , a former fighter pilot.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲是一位战争英雄，曾经是战斗机飞行员。

sentences.english: the unsung heroes who drove convoys of aid to Bosnia
sentences.chinese: 运载援助物品到波斯尼亚的那些无名英雄

sentences.english: A man hailed as a hero for 50 years has been unmasked as a traitor.
sentences.chinese: 50年来一直被誉为英雄的人被揭发为叛徒。

sentences.english: The hero of Doctor Zhivago dies in 1929.
sentences.chinese: 《日瓦戈医生》的男主人公于1929年去世。

detailed_translations.english: a man who is admired for doing something extremely brave

sentences.english: I assume her politics must be fairly conservative.
sentences.chinese: 我猜她的政治观点一定相当保守。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s political beliefs and opinions

sentences.english: Nothomb is a Belgian author.
sentences.chinese: 诺东是位比利时作家。

sentences.english: It’s clear that the author is a woman.
sentences.chinese: 显然，这位作者是女性。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has written a book

name: serious
trans: adj.严肃的;严重的;庄重的;认真的;

sentences.english: the serious problem of unemployment
sentences.chinese: 严重的失业问题

sentences.english: Luckily, the damage was not serious.
sentences.chinese: 还好，损坏不算严重。

sentences.english: Serious crimes have increased dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 重大犯罪案件大幅度增加了。

sentences.english: Oil spills pose a serious threat to marine life.
sentences.chinese: 原油泄漏对海洋生物构成了严重威胁。

sentences.english: The president was in serious trouble .
sentences.chinese: 总统遇到大麻烦了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 严肃的，严重的；认真的；庄重的；危急的
detailed_translations.english: a serious situation, problem, accident etc is extremely bad or dangerous

name: prone
trans: adj.俯卧的;易于...的;有...倾向的;

sentences.english: His eyes shifted to the prone body on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 他的视线移向了趴在地上的尸体。

detailed_translations.chinese: 易于…的， 很有可能…的； 俯卧的
detailed_translations.english: likely to do something or suffer from something, especially something bad or harmful

name: essential
trans: adj.必需的;基本的;本质的n.必需品;

sentences.english: Window locks are fairly cheap and absolutely essential.
sentences.chinese: 窗锁相当便宜，绝对有必要安装。

sentences.english: Even in small companies, computers are an essential tool.
sentences.chinese: 即使在小公司里，计算机也是不可或缺的工具。

detailed_translations.english: extremely important and necessary
something that is necessary to do something or in a particular situation

name: fundamental
trans: adj.基本的;基础的;根本的n.基本原则;基本原理;

sentences.english: We have to tackle the fundamental cause of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须解决问题的根本原因。

sentences.english: the fundamental principles of liberty and equality
sentences.chinese: 自由和平等这两个基本原则

detailed_translations.english: relating to the most basic and important parts of something

sentences.english: a steel bridge
sentences.chinese: 钢铁大桥

sentences.english: stainless steel(= steel that does not change colour ) knives
sentences.chinese: 不锈钢小刀

detailed_translations.english: strong metal that can be shaped easily, consisting of iron and  carbon

sentences.english: traditional Italian cooking
sentences.chinese: 传统的意大利烹饪

sentences.english: a traditional Irish folk song
sentences.chinese: 传统的爱尔兰民歌

sentences.english: a traditional method of brewing beer
sentences.chinese: 传统的啤酒酿造方法

detailed_translations.english: being part of the traditions of a country or group of people

sentences.english: It’s just an ordinary camera.
sentences.chinese: 这只是普通的相机。

sentences.english: The book is about ordinary people.
sentences.chinese: 这本书描写的是普通人。

sentences.english: Art should be part of ordinary life.
sentences.chinese: 艺术应该是日常生活的一部分。

sentences.english: It is good because it is written in friendly, ordinary language.
sentences.chinese: 它很不错，因为它是用平易近人的日常语言写的。

detailed_translations.english: average, common, or usual, not different or special

sentences.english: There is nothing in the rules of grammar to suggest that ending a sentence with a preposition is wrong.
sentences.chinese: 在语法规则中没有哪一条表明以介词结束一个句子是错误的。

detailed_translations.english: a word that is used before a noun,  pronoun  , or  gerund  to show place, time, direction etc. In the phrase ‘the trees in the park’, ‘in’ is a preposition.

sentences.english: a butterfly with beautiful markings on its wings
sentences.chinese: 翅膀上有美丽花纹的蝴蝶

sentences.english: The pheasant flapped its wings vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 野鸡猛烈地拍打翅膀。

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts of a bird’s or insect’s body that it uses for flying
to fly somewhere

sentences.english: second-hand clothes
sentences.chinese: 旧衣服

sentences.english: a second-hand car
sentences.chinese: 二手车

detailed_translations.english: second-hand things are not new when you get them, because they were owned by someone else before you

sentences.english: a bright cheerful Italian restaurant
sentences.chinese: 一家明亮宜人的意大利餐馆

sentences.english: There was a cheerful picture on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 墙上有一张赏心悦目的画。

sentences.english: The house has a cheerful atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子有一种令人愉快的气氛。

detailed_translations.english: something that is cheerful makes you feel happy because it is so bright or pleasant

sentences.english: plans to radically reform the tax system
sentences.chinese: 彻底改革税收制度的计划

detailed_translations.chinese: 改革， 改良， 改造； 改正， 改过自新
detailed_translations.english: to improve a system, law, organization etc by making a lot of changes to it, so that it operates in a fairer or more effective way

name: contract
trans: n.合同;契约v.（使）收缩;订合同;感染;

sentences.english: Employees who refuse to relocate are in breach of contract (= have done something not allowed by their contracts ) .
sentences.chinese: 员工拒绝调动岗位是违反合约的。

detailed_translations.english: an official agreement between two or more people, stating what each will do

name: barren
trans: adj.贫瘠的;不结果实的;不孕的;无价值的;

sentences.english: Thousands of years ago the surface was barren desert.
sentences.chinese: 很久很久以前，地面还是一片荒漠。

sentences.english: He prayed that his barren wife would one day have a child.
sentences.chinese: 他祈祷自己不孕的妻子有朝一日能怀上宝宝。

detailed_translations.english: (of land or soil) not good enough for plants to grow on it

sentences.english: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.chinese: 人类历史上最重大的事件之一

detailed_translations.english: something that happens, especially something important, interesting or unusual

sentences.english: government intervention to regulate prices
sentences.chinese: 政府介入控制物价

detailed_translations.english: the act of becoming involved in an argument, fight, or other difficult situation in order to change what happens

sentences.english: The gate is made of metal.
sentences.chinese: 这扇大门是用金属做成的。

sentences.english: a small black metal box
sentences.chinese: 一个黑色的金属小盒子

sentences.english: They traded in gold and other precious metals (= valuable metals used especially for making jewellery ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们做黄金和其他贵金属的交易。

sentences.english: The old trucks were sold as scrap metal (= old metal that is melted and used again ) .
sentences.chinese: 这些旧卡车被当作金属废料卖掉了。

detailed_translations.english: a hard, usually shiny substance such as iron, gold, or steel

name: kiosk
trans: n.售货亭;报刊亭;公用电话亭;

sentences.english: "We went into a market and established a kiosk in that market out of a butcher's shop," Kalanda says.
sentences.chinese: 卡兰达说，“由于一家肉店，我们进入这个市场，在那个市场我们建立了一个公用电话亭”

sentences.english: We found that only about 5% of the time did people bother to tell the kiosk that they took an accessory.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现，只有在近5%的情况下，人们肯在数字亭中留下自己领取配件的信息。

sentences.english: He operated a small tea shop there, a portable metal kiosk from which he served low-ranking bureaucrats who worked in the surrounding government offices.
sentences.chinese: 如今他在这里开设了一家小茶亭——那是个轻便的金属亭子，为附近政府机构的低级别官员提供服务。

sentences.english: The country has made great advances since independence.
sentences.chinese: 该国自独立以来发展迅速。

detailed_translations.chinese: 独立； 自主； 自立
detailed_translations.english: political freedom from control by the government of another country

sentences.english: Francis is the same age as me.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯和我同年岁。

sentences.english: Experts disagree over the age of the drawings.
sentences.chinese: 专家对这些画作的年代意见不统一。

sentences.english: Dad retired at the age of 56.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸是在56岁时退休的。

sentences.english: We are living in the age of technology.
sentences.chinese: 我们生活在科技时代。

sentences.english: He was worried to see how much she’d aged.
sentences.chinese: 看到她苍老了许多，他很担心。

detailed_translations.english: the number of years someone has lived or something has existed
to start looking older or to make someone or something look older

name: immune
trans: adj.免疫的;有免疫力的;不受影响的;

sentences.english: Once we’ve had the disease, we’re immune for life.
sentences.chinese: 我们一旦得过这种病，就获得了终身免疫力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 免疫的， 有免疫力的， 不受影响的； 免除的， 豁免的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is immune to a particular disease cannot catch it

sentences.english: The building opposite us is the warehouse.
sentences.chinese: 我们对面的那个建筑是仓库。

sentences.english: Each warehouse reports back to the retailer which portion (if any) of the customer order it was able to fulfil.
sentences.chinese: 每个仓库把它能完成客户定单的哪个部分（如果有）的报告返回给零售商。

sentences.english: This option allows organizations to pay only for the volume of compressed user data they manage in their warehouse.
sentences.chinese: 该定价方式允许组织只为他们在其仓库中管理的压缩的用户数据量进行付费。

detailed_translations.english: a large building for storing large quantities of goods

name: carving
trans: n.雕刻品;雕刻图案v.雕刻;切开;“carve”的现在分词;

sentences.english: ...a wood carving of a human hand.
sentences.chinese: …一尊人手木雕。

detailed_translations.english: an object or pattern made by cutting a shape in wood or stone for decoration

sentences.english: each individual’s right to privacy
sentences.chinese: 每个人的隐私权

detailed_translations.english: the state of being free from public attention

detailed_translations.chinese: 省略符号，撇号；呼语，顿呼
detailed_translations.english: the sign (‘) that is used in writing to show that numbers or letters have been left out, as in ’don’t' (=  do not  ) and '86 (=  1986  )

name: poll
trans: n.民意调查v.获得（选票）;做民意调查;

sentences.english: A recent poll found that 80% of Californians support the governor.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一项民意调查发现80%的加利福尼亚人支持州长。

sentences.english: Polls indicate that education is the top issue with voters.
sentences.chinese: 民意调查显示，教育是选民心中的头等大事。

sentences.english: Labour is ahead in the polls.
sentences.chinese: 工党在民意调查中处于领先地位。

sentences.english: The latest public opinion poll showed that 25% of us consider ourselves superstitious.
sentences.chinese: 最新的民意调查显示我们中有25%的人认为自己迷信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 民意测验；政治选举，大选
detailed_translations.english: the process of finding out what people think about something by asking many people the same question, or the record of the result

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…进行民意测验； 获得
detailed_translations.english: to ask a lot of people the same questions in order to find out what they think about a subject

sentences.english: He slipped and fell, badly bruising an elbow.
sentences.chinese: 他滑倒了，严重挫伤了一只胳膊肘。

detailed_translations.english: the joint where your arm bends
to push someone with your elbows, especially in order to move past them

name: hunting
trans: n.打猎;寻找v.打猎;搜寻;“hunt”的现在分词;

sentences.english: That’s a nice tune.
sentences.chinese: 那曲调很美。

sentences.english: She sang some old classics and a few new tunes.
sentences.chinese: 她唱了几首经典老歌和一些新曲。

sentences.english: Someone’s coming tomorrow to tune the piano.
sentences.chinese: 明天有人来给钢琴调音。

detailed_translations.english: a series of musical notes that are played or sung and are nice to listen to
to make a musical instrument play at the right pitch

sentences.english: The industry underwent a period of rapid expansion.
sentences.chinese: 该产业经历了一轮快速扩张。

detailed_translations.english: when something increases in size, range, amount etc

name: sailing
trans: n.航海;帆船运动;水运航班v.航行;驾（船）;“sail”的现在分词;

sentences.english: Bud has invited us to go sailing this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 巴德邀请我们这个周末驾船出游。

detailed_translations.english: the sport or activity of travelling in or directing a small boat with sails

detailed_translations.chinese: 航行，起航（sail的现在分词形式）

name: rows
trans: n.行;排;划船;吵闹;“row”的复数v.划船;将...排成排;吵架;“row”的第三人称单数;

name: maintain
trans: v.保持;坚持认为;维护;供养;

sentences.english: Careers Officers maintain contact with young people when they have left school.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人离开学校以后，职业指导员和他们保持联系。

sentences.english: Britain wants to maintain its position as a world power.
sentences.chinese: 英国想保持其世界强国的地位。

sentences.english: A lot depends on building and maintaining a good relationship with your customers.
sentences.chinese: 和顾客建立并保持良好关系很重要，很多事情要取决于此。

sentences.english: The hotel prides itself on maintaining high standards.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店以保持高标准而自豪。

sentences.english: How can we maintain control of spending?
sentences.chinese: 我们如何保持对开支的控制？

sentences.english: Critics maintain that these reforms will lead to a decline in educational standards.
sentences.chinese: 批评者坚称这些改革会导致教育标准下降。

detailed_translations.english: to make something continue in the same way or at the same standard as before

sentences.english: the former Soviet Union
sentences.chinese: 前苏联

sentences.english: Their farm has been reduced to half its former size.
sentences.chinese: 他们的农场已缩小到以前的一半。

sentences.english: Of the two possibilities, the former seems more likely.
sentences.chinese: 在这两种可能性中，前者似乎更有可能。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing before, but not now
the first of two people or things that you have just mentioned

sentences.english: She has a teenage daughter from a previous marriage.
sentences.chinese: 她有个出自前一次婚姻的十几岁的女儿。

detailed_translations.english: A previous event or thing is one that happened or existed before the one that you are talking about

name: surrounding
trans: adj.周围的;附近的v.环绕;围绕;“surround”的现在分词;

sentences.english: Troops sealed off the surrounding area .
sentences.chinese: 军队封锁了周围地区。

sentences.english: We decided to explore the surrounding countryside .
sentences.chinese: 我们决定去附近的乡间走走看看。

detailed_translations.english: near or around a particular place

sentences.english: some toys for the baby
sentences.chinese: 宝宝玩的一些玩具

sentences.english: Annie was playing happily with her toys .
sentences.chinese: 安妮正高兴地玩着玩具。

detailed_translations.chinese: 玩具；小装饰品；不值钱的东西
detailed_translations.english: an object for children to play with

detailed_translations.chinese: 玩弄；调情；随随便便地对待

sentences.english: I saw the look of expectancy in the children’s eyes.
sentences.chinese: 我从孩子们的眼神中看到了期盼。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that something pleasant or exciting is going to happen

name: fabric
trans: n.织物;布料;构造;（建筑物的）结构;

sentences.english: our new range of fabrics and wallpapers
sentences.chinese: 我们新的织物和墙纸系列

sentences.english: The country’s social fabric is disintegrating.
sentences.chinese: 该国的社会结构正在瓦解。

detailed_translations.english: cloth used for making clothes, curtains etc

sentences.english: The plane’s tail section was found in a cornfield.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的尾部在玉米田里找到了。

sentences.english: the smoking section (= where you can smoke )
sentences.chinese: 吸烟区

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts that something such as an object or place is divided into

sentences.english: I lay on my back and looked up at the stars.
sentences.chinese: 我仰卧着看天上的星星。

sentences.english: The sky was filled with stars.
sentences.chinese: 满天繁星。

sentences.english: The stars were shining .
sentences.chinese: 群星闪烁。

sentences.english: The stars were all out (= they were shining ) .
sentences.chinese: 星耀天空。

sentences.english: The stars were twinkling overhead (= shining and quickly changing from bright to faint ) .
sentences.chinese: 头顶上星星闪烁。

detailed_translations.english: a large ball of burning gas in space that can be seen at night as a point of light in the sky

detailed_translations.chinese: 以星状物装饰,变成演员

sentences.english: artistic work
sentences.chinese: 艺术作品

sentences.english: Opinion about the artistic merit of his paintings has been mixed.
sentences.chinese: 对于他的绘画作品的艺术价值，人们褒贬不一。

detailed_translations.english: relating to art or culture

sentences.english: a self-sufficient farm
sentences.chinese: 自给自足的农场

detailed_translations.english: able to provide all the things you need without help from other people

sentences.english: This is a fine book; a worthy addition to the series.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本好书——是对这套丛书有价值的增补。

detailed_translations.chinese: 加， 加法； 附加物
detailed_translations.english: something that is added to something else, often in order to improve it

name: sacked
trans: v.解雇;装入袋子;劫掠;“sack”的过去式和过去分词;

sentences.english: Do you have a colour preference ?
sentences.chinese: 你有什么颜色上的偏好吗？

sentences.english: Parents may be able to express a preference as to the school their child will attend.
sentences.chinese: 家长也许可以表明愿意让孩子就读哪所学校。

sentences.english: The amount of sugar you add will depend on personal preference .
sentences.chinese: 加多少糖取决于个人的喜好。

sentences.english: Many elderly people expressed a strong preference to live in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人强烈表示喜欢住在自己的家里。

sentences.english: In allocating housing, preference is given to families with young children.
sentences.chinese: 房屋优先分配给有年幼孩子的家庭。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a preference for something, you like it more than another thing and will choose it if you can

sentences.english: Two flashes mean danger.
sentences.chinese: 两次闪光表示危险。

sentences.english: Lightning flashed overhead.
sentences.chinese: 头顶上电光闪闪。

detailed_translations.english: a bright light that shines for a short time and then stops shining
to shine suddenly and brightly for a short time, or to make something shine in this way

sentences.english: It’s been cold, but today’s an exception.
sentences.chinese: 天气一直寒冷，但今天是个例外。

sentences.english: The law applies to all EU countries; Britain is no exception.
sentences.chinese: 这项法律适用于所有欧盟国家，英国也不例外。

sentences.english: We don’t usually accept checks, but for you we’ll make an exception (= not include you in this rule ).
sentences.chinese: 我们一般不接受支票，但对你我们就破个例。

sentences.english: The spelling of this word is an interesting exception to the rule.
sentences.chinese: 这个单词的拼法是该规则一个有趣的例外。

sentences.english: Successful two-career couples are still the exception, not the rule (= used to emphasize that something is unusual ).
sentences.chinese: 夫妇俩都事业有成的仍不常见。

detailed_translations.english: something or someone that is not included in a general statement or does not follow a rule or pattern

name: reinforced
trans: adj.加强的v.增强;“reinforce”的过去式和过去分词;

name: highly-trained
trans: adj.高度训练的;训练有素的;

sentences.english: Test scores vary from school to school.
sentences.chinese: 测验成绩各校不同。

sentences.english: The heights of the plants vary from 8 cm to 20 cm.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物的高度从8厘米到20厘米不等。

sentences.english: Medical treatment varies greatly from state to state.
sentences.chinese: 医疗制度州与州之间差异很大。

sentences.english: Cooking times may vary slightly, depending on your oven.
sentences.chinese: 烹饪时间可能略有不同，因烤炉而异。

sentences.english: Charges vary according to size.
sentences.chinese: 费用因大小而异。

sentences.english: She has tried different diets with varying degrees of success.
sentences.chinese: 她试过各种不同的节食方式，效果各不相同。

sentences.english: tests of varying levels of difficulty
sentences.chinese: 难易程度不一的测验

sentences.english: Quentin’s mood seems to vary according to the weather.
sentences.chinese: 昆廷的情绪似乎随天气而变化。

detailed_translations.english: if several things of the same type vary, they are all different from each other

sentences.english: I think he’s harbouring some sort of grudge against me.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得他对我有点怀恨在心。

sentences.english: Sinks and draining boards can harbour germs.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽和沥水板可能藏有病菌。

sentences.english: Accusations of harbouring suspects were raised against the former Hungarian leadership.
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利前领导人被指控窝藏疑犯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 怀着（不好的想法、恐惧或希望）；包含，藏有；窝藏
detailed_translations.english: to keep bad thoughts, fears, or hopes in your mind for a long time

name: skin
trans: n.皮肤;毛皮;外皮v.剥皮;削皮;

sentences.english: She had thick black hair and smooth dark skin.
sentences.chinese: 她一头浓密的黑发，皮肤黝黑光滑。

sentences.english: The skin on his hands was dry and rough.
sentences.chinese: 他手上的皮肤干燥粗糙。

detailed_translations.english: the natural outer layer of a person’s or animal’s body
to remove the skin from an animal, fruit, or vegetable

sentences.english: a heroine of the French Resistance
sentences.chinese: 法国抵抗运动的一位女英雄

sentences.english: The heroine is a senior TV executive.
sentences.chinese: 女主人公是一位电视台高级主管。

detailed_translations.english: a woman who is admired for doing something extremely brave

sentences.english: Prolonged exposure to the sun can cause skin cancer.
sentences.chinese: 长时间晒太阳会导致皮肤癌。

sentences.english: the exposure of his underground political activity
sentences.chinese: 对他地下政治活动的揭露

sentences.english: The failure of their marriage has got a lot of exposure recently.
sentences.chinese: 他俩婚姻失败一事最近被频频曝光。

detailed_translations.english: when someone is in a situation where they are not protected from something dangerous or unpleasant

sentences.english: Her inability to concentrate could cause an accident.
sentences.chinese: 她无法集中注意力可能会导致意外。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of being unable to do something

sentences.english: They fashioned him into a fine pianist.
sentences.chinese: 他们把他培养成一个优秀的钢琴家。

sentences.english: He is now being  coached by a famous pianist.
sentences.chinese: 他现在正由一位著名的钢琴家进行辅导。

sentences.english: The pianist was irked because the audience's coughing drowned out his playing.
sentences.chinese: 这名钢琴演奏者很厌烦，因为听众的咳嗽声盖过了他的演奏。

detailed_translations.english: someone who plays the piano

name: housing
trans: n.住房供给v.收容;“house”的现在分词;

sentences.english: health problems caused by bad housing
sentences.chinese: 住房条件差引起的健康问题

sentences.english: a scheme to provide affordable housing for local people
sentences.chinese: 为当地民众提供平价住宅的计划

detailed_translations.chinese: 房屋， 住宅； 住房建筑， 住房供给； 外壳， 外罩
detailed_translations.english: the houses or conditions that people live in

sentences.english: We walked up four flights of stairs (= sets of stairs ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们往上走了四段楼梯。

detailed_translations.english: a set of steps built for going from one level of a building to another

sentences.english: If you wish to make a complaint, you should see the manager.
sentences.chinese: 如果你要投诉，应该去找经理。

sentences.english: The sales assistants are trained to deal with customer complaints in a friendly manner.
sentences.chinese: 售货员都受过培训，要以友好的态度处理顾客的投诉。

detailed_translations.english: a statement in which someone complains about something

sentences.english: What’s that noise?
sentences.chinese: 那是什么声音？

sentences.english: Try not to make a noise when you go upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 上楼时尽量不要弄出声。

sentences.english: There was a lot of noise outside.
sentences.chinese: 外面很吵闹。

sentences.english: Noise levels have been reduced by 20%.
sentences.chinese: 噪音水平下降了20%。

detailed_translations.english: a sound, especially one that is loud, unpleasant, or frightening

sentences.english: The company has identified 60 potential customers.
sentences.chinese: 该公司已确定了60位潜在的客户。

detailed_translations.english: likely to develop into a particular type of person or thing in the future
the possibility that something will develop in a particular way, or have a particular effect

sentences.english: The alterations doubled the value of the house.
sentences.chinese: 经改建后这所房子增值了一倍。

sentences.english: We decided to get the house valued.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定给房子估一估价。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that something is worth
to decide how much money something is worth, by comparing it with similar things

sentences.english: The town is a mixture of the old and the new.
sentences.chinese: 这个小城新旧结合。

detailed_translations.english: a combination of two or more different things, feelings, or types of people

sentences.english: Jo was tired, irritable, and depressed.
sentences.chinese: 乔疲惫暴躁，而且情绪低落。

detailed_translations.english: getting annoyed quickly or easily

sentences.english: Only the timely arrival of the police prevented the situation from becoming worse.
sentences.chinese: 警方及时赶到才阻止了事态恶化。

sentences.english: Traffic problems account for one third of late arrivals.
sentences.chinese: 迟到的人有三分之一是因为交通问题。

sentences.english: The first arrivals at the concert got the best seats.
sentences.chinese: 最早来到音乐会的人坐上了最好的座位。

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something arrives somewhere

sentences.english: She got great satisfaction from helping people to learn.
sentences.chinese: 她在帮助人们学习的过程中得到很大的满足。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of happiness or pleasure because you have achieved something or got what you wanted

name: status
trans: n.地位;身份;状态;职称;重要性;

sentences.english: These documents have no legal status in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 这些文件在英国并无法律效力。

sentences.english: What is your marital status (= are you married or not ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你的婚姻状况是什么？

detailed_translations.english: the official legal position or condition of a person, group, country etc

name: stage
trans: n.阶段;时期;舞台v.举行;上演;

sentences.english: We’re getting to the stage where we hardly ever go out together.
sentences.chinese: 我们快要到几乎不一起外出的地步了。

sentences.english: She is on stage for most of the play.
sentences.chinese: 这出戏的大部分时间里她都在台上

detailed_translations.english: a particular time or state that something reaches as it grows or develops

name: permit
trans: v.允许;准许n.通行证;许可证;执照;

sentences.english: Smoking is only permitted in the public lounge.
sentences.chinese: 只允许在公共休息室里抽烟。

sentences.english: He had more than the permitted level of alcohol in his blood.
sentences.chinese: 他血液中的酒精含量超出了允许的水平。

detailed_translations.english: to allow something to happen, especially by an official decision, rule, or law
an official written statement giving you the right to do something

sentences.english: the discovery of oil in Alaska
sentences.chinese: 在阿拉斯加发现石油

sentences.english: The Hubble Telescope allowed astronomers to make significant discoveries about our galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 哈勃望远镜使天文学家对我们的银河系有了重大发现。

detailed_translations.english: when someone discovers something

sentences.english: The parcel was delivered last week.
sentences.chinese: 那个邮包上周送到了。

sentences.english: He sends regular food parcels to his family in Libya.
sentences.chinese: 他定期给在利比亚的家人邮寄食品包裹。

detailed_translations.english: an object that has been wrapped in paper or put in a special envelope, especially so that it can be sent by post

sentences.english: We can only prosecute if there is sufficient evidence.
sentences.chinese: 有了足够的证据，我们才能提出起诉。

sentences.english: Unauthorized absence is sufficient reason for dismissal.
sentences.chinese: 旷工足以成为解雇的理由。

sentences.english: We need sufficient time to deal with the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要足够的时间来处理这个问题。

detailed_translations.english: as much as is needed for a particular purpose

sentences.english: As a critic, he is far too subjective.
sentences.chinese: 作为评论家，他过于主观。

sentences.english: a highly subjective point of view
sentences.chinese: 相当主观的看法

detailed_translations.english: a state-ment, report, attitude etc that is subjective is influenced by personal opinion and can therefore be unfair

sentences.english: He vowed to achieve certain objectives before the end of his presidency.
sentences.chinese: 他立誓要在他的总统任期结束之前实现某些目标。

sentences.english: the best way to accomplish your objectives
sentences.chinese: 完成目标的最佳方法

sentences.english: The degree program has two main objectives.
sentences.chinese: 该学位课程有两个主要目标。

sentences.english: Managers should set specific performance objectives for their teams.
sentences.chinese: 经理应该为自己的团队制定明确的绩效目标。

sentences.english: The main objective was to improve children’s knowledge of geography.
sentences.chinese: 主要目的是要增长儿童的地理知识。

sentences.english: A clear objective was set and adhered to.
sentences.chinese: 定下了明确的目标并坚持到底。

sentences.english: One of your first business objectives should be to get your own office.
sentences.chinese: 你的首要工作目标之一应该是拥有自己的办公室。

detailed_translations.english: something that you are trying hard to achieve, especially in business or politics

sentences.english: The full address is given on page 15.
sentences.chinese: 详细地址见第15页。

sentences.english: You will find the answers over the page .
sentences.chinese: 答案见下页。

sentences.english: a 400﹣page novel
sentences.chinese: 一本400页的小说

sentences.english: We took out a full page advertisement in the ‘Village Voice’.
sentences.chinese: 我们在《村声》上投放了一整版广告。

detailed_translations.english: one side of a piece of paper in a book, newspaper, document etc, or the sheet of paper itself

sentences.english: Make a cheese sauce in the usual way.
sentences.chinese: 按通常的做法做奶酪酱。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you at the usual time.
sentences.chinese: 我在老时间和你碰头。

sentences.english: She ate twice as much as usual.
sentences.chinese: 她吃了平时食量两倍的东西。

detailed_translations.english: happening, done, or existing most of the time or in most situations

name: latest
trans: n.最新消息;最新事物adj.最新的;最近的;最后的;“late”的最高级;

sentences.english: He telephoned me the latest news.
sentences.chinese: 他打电话告诉我最新的消息。

sentences.english: His latest novel was cut up by the reviewers.
sentences.chinese: 他的最新小说被评论家批得体无完肤。

sentences.english: In order to prove his point he showed them the latest sales figures.
sentences.chinese: 为了证明他的观点，他给他们看了最新的销售数字。

detailed_translations.english: the most recent or newest thing

detailed_translations.chinese: 最新的，最近的；最迟的，最后的
detailed_translations.english: the most recent or the newest

sentences.english: child development
sentences.chinese: 儿童发育

sentences.english: The funds will be used for marketing and product development.
sentences.chinese: 这笔资金将用于市场营销和产品开发。

detailed_translations.english: the process of gradually becoming bigger, better, stronger, or more advanced

sentences.english: a wedding rehearsal
sentences.chinese: 婚礼的预演

detailed_translations.chinese: 排演；预演；练习；训练；叙述
detailed_translations.english: a time when all the people in a play, concert etc practise before a public performance

sentences.english: They all had sticks which they planned to use as weapons.
sentences.chinese: 他们都持有棍棒，打算当武器用。

detailed_translations.english: something that you use to fight with or attack someone with, such as a knife, bomb, or gun

name: trade
trans: n.贸易;交易;行业v.贸易;交易;

sentences.english: They had to travel into town to trade the produce from their farm.
sentences.chinese: 他们不得不到镇上去出售他们农场的产品。

sentences.english: We traded necklaces.
sentences.chinese: 我们交换了项链。

detailed_translations.english: to buy and sell goods, services etc as your job or business

sentences.english: We must encourage innovation if the company is to remain competitive.
sentences.chinese: 公司要想保持竞争力，就必须鼓励革新。

sentences.english: recent innovations in English teaching
sentences.chinese: 英语教学的新创举

detailed_translations.english: the introduction of new ideas or methods

sentences.english: Mexico's Mount Colima began spewing lava and ash last night.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥科利马山昨晚开始喷发熔岩和火山灰。

detailed_translations.english: hot liquid rock that flows from a volcano,or this rock when it has become solid

sentences.english: There have been a number of thefts in the area.
sentences.chinese: 该地区发生了几宗偷窃案。

sentences.english: the theft of £150 from the office
sentences.chinese: 办公室150英镑失窃

detailed_translations.english: an act of stealing something

sentences.english: He did not have much knowledge of American history.
sentences.chinese: 他对美国历史所知不多。

sentences.english: Evans denied all knowledge of the robbery.
sentences.chinese: 埃文斯说他对这次抢劫一无所知。

detailed_translations.english: the information, skills, and understanding that you have gained through learning or experience

sentences.english: long dark curly hair
sentences.chinese: 又长又黑的鬈发

detailed_translations.english: having a lot of curls or a curved shape

detailed_translations.english: to become worse

trans: adj.自由的;免费的[副]自由地;免费地v.释放;

sentences.chinese: 他从铁路桥上走了回去。

name: amazing

sentences.english: He’s an amazing player to watch.

sentences.english: supermarket shelves
sentences.chinese: 超级市场的货架

sentences.english: the amount of shelf space available
sentences.chinese: 可用的货架空间

detailed_translations.english: a long flat narrow board attached to a wall or in a frame or cupboard, used for putting things on

sentences.chinese: 良好的照明能给房间增色不少。

sentences.chinese: 这次宣传提高了他的声誉。

sentences.chinese: 为想提高英语水平的学生开设的一门课

sentences.chinese: 你可以用这笔钱改善家居。

sentences.chinese: 无铅汽油

sentences.english: petrol prices
sentences.chinese: 汽油价格

sentences.english: The petrol tank is leaking.
sentences.chinese: 油箱漏了。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid obtained from  petroleum that is used to supply power to the engine of cars and other vehicles

sentences.chinese: 我们为家庭录音间装了隔音设备。

detailed_translations.english: to make something soundproof

sentences.english: The company is closing down two of its factories, leading to 430 job losses .
sentences.chinese: 公司要关闭其中的两家工厂，这将造成430人失业。

sentences.english: Weight loss should be gradual.
sentences.chinese: 减肥应该循序渐进。

sentences.english: a type of hearing loss that affects language development
sentences.chinese: 一种会影响语言能力发展的听力丧失

sentences.chinese: 巴西对阿根廷1:2的落败

detailed_translations.english: the fact of no longer having something, or of having less of it than you used to have, or the process by which this happens

sentences.chinese: 我鞋子上有什么黏糊糊的东西。

sentences.english: How do you think you’re going to fit all that stuff into the car?
sentences.chinese: 你说这么多东西你怎么装进车里？

sentences.chinese: 我很同情那些只能吃这种难吃东西的人。

sentences.english: Where’s all the camping stuff?

detailed_translations.english: used when you are talking about things such as substances, materials, or groups of objects when you do not know what they are called, or it is not important to say exactly what they are

sentences.chinese: 持枪的叛乱分子负隅顽抗。

sentences.english: disease resistance
sentences.chinese: 抗病能力

name: authority
trans: n.权威;权威人士;权力;当局;官方机构;

sentences.english: an agreement between the US and Colombian authorities
sentences.chinese: 美国和哥伦比亚当局的一份协议

sentences.english: Only the president has the authority to declare war.
sentences.chinese: 只有总统才有权宣战。

sentences.english: I need to speak to someone in authority (= who has a position of power ) .
sentences.chinese: 我得找管事的人谈谈。

detailed_translations.english: [plural] the people or organizations that are in charge of a particular country or area

sentences.english: There are fewer opportunities for new graduates this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年新毕业的大学生就业机会较少。

detailed_translations.english: a chance to do something or an occasion when it is easy for you to do something

sentences.english: ...a professor of mathematics at Boston College.
sentences.chinese: …一位波士顿大学的数学教授。

sentences.chinese: 这场雪对交通造成的影响可以预见。

detailed_translations.english: if something or someone is predictable, you know what will happen or what they will do – sometimes used to show disapproval

sentences.chinese: 乐队正在演奏披头士的老歌。

sentences.chinese: 史密斯在1989年加入这个乐队。

sentences.english: interviews with band members

sentences.english: Our old car is badly in need of replacement.

sentences.english: ice cream in plastic containers

sentences.english: a container ship

detailed_translations.english: something such as a box or bowl that you use to keep things in

name: margin
trans: n.边缘;差额;利润;页边的空白处;余地;

sentences.chinese: 有人在页边写了条批注。

sentences.chinese: 采用双倍行距和宽阔的页边空白，以便留出地方写评注。

sentences.english: the western margin of southern Africa

sentences.chinese: 她正忙着筹备女儿的婚礼。

sentences.english: When is the wedding?

sentences.chinese: 气象通信卫星的发射

sentences.english: We offer financial assistance to students.
sentences.chinese: 我们向学生提供经济援助。

sentences.english: Can I be of any assistance (=  can I help you  ) ?
sentences.chinese: 我能帮什么忙吗？

detailed_translations.english: help or support

name: reverse
trans: v.使倒转;使颠倒;（使）倒车;撤销n.反面;背面adj.相反的;反向的;

sentences.english: Reverse the paper in the printer.
sentences.chinese: 把打印机中的纸翻过来。

sentences.english: The wrong attitude will have exactly the reverse effect.
sentences.chinese: 这种错误的态度会得到恰好相反的结果。

detailed_translations.english: if a vehicle or its driver reverses, they go backwards

detailed_translations.chinese: 反向的； 相反的； 颠倒的

detailed_translations.chinese: 撤销，废除；使完全相反，彻底转变；使反转，使次序颠倒

detailed_translations.chinese: 相反情况，对立面；反面，背面，后面；损失，倒退
detailed_translations.english: the exact opposite of what has just been mentioned

name: awful
trans: adj.可怕的;糟糕的;讨厌的[副]非常;极其;

sentences.english: The weather was awful.
sentences.chinese: 天气很糟糕。

detailed_translations.english: very bad or unpleasant

name: appeal
trans: n.恳求;呼吁;上诉;吸引力v.呼吁;吸引;诉请;

sentences.english: The girl’s family have made a public appeal for help to try and catch her killer.
sentences.chinese: 那名遇害女孩的家人吁请公众协助捉拿凶手。

sentences.english: an appeal to the European Court of Human Rights
sentences.chinese: 向欧洲人权法庭提出的上诉

sentences.chinese: 农场主请求政府帮助。

sentences.english: She is not happy with the decision and plans to appeal.
sentences.chinese: 她不服判决，打算上诉

detailed_translations.english: an urgent request for something important

sentences.english: More than 75% of the land is used for agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 75%以上的土地用于农耕。

detailed_translations.chinese: 农业；农耕；农业生产；农艺，农学
detailed_translations.english: the practice or science of farming

sentences.english: a rise in the price of oil
sentences.chinese: 石油价格的上涨

sentences.english: the importance of protecting our oil supplies
sentences.chinese: 保护我们石油供应的重要性

sentences.english: an oil refinery
sentences.chinese: 炼油厂

sentences.english: The bicycle chain needs oiling.
sentences.chinese: 自行车链条需要上油了。

detailed_translations.english: the thick dark liquid from under the ground from which petrol is produced

sentences.chinese: 民众对政府越来越不满。

sentences.english: What angered me most was his total lack of remorse.
sentences.chinese: 最让我生气的是他居然毫无悔意。

to make someone angry

name: pop
trans: n.砰的一声;流行音乐;汽水v.发出砰的一声;突然地行动adj.流行的;通俗的[副]砰地;

sentences.english: The window opened and a dog's head popped out.
sentences.chinese: 窗子打开了，冷不防一只狗探出头来。

sentences.english: An idea suddenly popped into his head.
sentences.chinese: 他突然想到了一个主意。

detailed_translations.english: to suddenly appear, especially when not expected

name: delay
trans: v.推迟;延缓;耽搁n.推迟;延缓;耽搁;

sentences.english: Don’t delay – send off for the information now.
sentences.chinese: 别犹豫——即刻去函索取信息。

sentences.english: He delayed his decision on whether to call an election.
sentences.chinese: 在是否宣布举行选举一事上，他推迟作出决定。

detailed_translations.english: to wait until a later time to do something

sentences.english: an Olympic gold medal
sentences.chinese: 奥运会金牌

detailed_translations.chinese: 奥林匹斯山的，奥林匹亚的；奥林匹克的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the Olympic Games

sentences.english: His English was perfect.
sentences.chinese: 他的英语很地道。

sentences.english: The car was in perfect condition.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车的车况极佳。

sentences.english: You’re very lucky to have perfect teeth.
sentences.chinese: 你能拥有一口完美的牙齿太幸运了。

sentences.english: a perfect performance
sentences.chinese: 完美的演出

sentences.english: In a perfect world, we wouldn’t need an army.
sentences.chinese: 在理想世界中，我们不需要军队。

detailed_translations.english: not having any mistakes, faults, or damage

sentences.chinese: 我们希望能找到一所合适的学校。

sentences.english: The lighted dial of her watch said 1.20.
sentences.chinese: 她手表上的夜光表面显示时间为1点20分。

sentences.english: I think I dialed the wrong number.
sentences.chinese: 我想我拨错号码了。

sentences.chinese: 她感觉泪水刺痛了眼睛。

sentences.english: He was stung by a bee.
sentences.chinese: 他被蜜蜂蜇了。

detailed_translations.english: a sharp pain in your eyes or skin, caused by being hit, by smoke etc

sentences.chinese: 他离开妻子成了一大丑闻。

sentences.chinese: 这所大学最近卷入了毒品丑闻。

sentences.chinese: 他成了一桩政治丑闻的焦点。

sentences.english: a major scandal involving the government
sentences.chinese: 涉及政府的一桩重大丑闻

sentences.chinese: 一连串金融丑闻

sentences.english: a sex scandal that ruined his reputation
sentences.chinese: 让他名誉扫地的性丑闻

sentences.chinese: 丑闻爆出时他们已经离开了这个国家。

detailed_translations.chinese: 丑事， 丑闻； 流言蜚语； 反感， 愤慨

name: sponsor
trans: n.赞助商;发起人v.赞助;主办;

sentences.english: When you define the project, you make sure that you have an agreement with the project sponsor on what work should be completed in this project.
sentences.chinese: 在你定义项目的时候，你要确保和项目发起人在项目应该完成的所有工作内容上达成一致意见。

sentences.english: It is important that your sponsor be truly committed to the value of the project to ensure that funds and support are not in jeopardy if adoption is not immediate.
sentences.chinese: 发起人必须真正认可项目的价值，这一点很重要，只有这样才能确保在推广没有立即见效时资金和支持不会随之消失。

name: alternative
trans: adj.供选择的n.供替代的选择;

sentences.chinese: 另一条路线是沿着联合路走。

detailed_translations.english: something you can choose to do or use instead of something else

sentences.chinese: 这张沙发太不舒服了。

detailed_translations.english: not feeling physically comfortable, or not making you feel comfortable

sentences.chinese: 法庭上出示了相关的文件。

sentences.english: We received all the relevant information.
sentences.chinese: 我们收到了所有相关信息。

detailed_translations.english: directly relating to the subject or problem being discussed or considered

sentences.english: She was even more beautiful than I had remembered.
sentences.chinese: 她比我记忆中更美。

sentences.english: a beautiful bunch of flowers
sentences.chinese: 一束美丽的花

sentences.chinese: 巧克力条

sentences.english: a chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: a packet of chocolate biscuits
sentences.chinese: 一包巧克力饼干

sentences.chinese: 和黑巧克力比起来，我更喜欢牛奶巧克力。

sentences.chinese: 一盒巧克力糖

sentences.chinese: 在一天结束后，把所有营养素的百分比加起来。

sentences.chinese: 机器的运转效率只能达到所耗燃料的百分之二十五。

sentences.chinese: 但是还有十亿多的人不在其中，他们不在其中的百分之一，也不再其中的两百分之一或者三百分之一的其中。

name: nurse
trans: n.护士;保姆v.护理;照料;喂奶;

sentences.chinese: 护士会来给你打针。

sentences.chinese: 学校的护士送萨拉回家。

sentences.english: a senior nurse
sentences.chinese: 高级护士

sentences.english: a student nurse (= someone who is learning to be a nurse )
sentences.chinese: 实习护士

sentences.english: a psychiatric nurse (= a nurse for people who are mentally ill )

sentences.chinese: 十年来他一直陪伴她左右。

sentences.chinese: 他的狗成了他最亲密的伙伴。

sentences.chinese: 旅伴

sentences.english: land usage

sentences.english: a book on modern English usage
sentences.chinese: 关于现代英语用法的书

detailed_translations.english: the degree to which something is used or the way in which it is used

sentences.english: The police force is below strength at the moment (= there are fewer police than there should be ).
sentences.chinese: 目前警力不足。

sentences.english: the strength of a rope
sentences.chinese: 绳子的强度

detailed_translations.english: the number of people in a team, army etc

sentences.chinese: 大麻可以为一些癌症患者减轻疼痛。

sentences.chinese: 为赈灾筹集的钱款

sentences.chinese: 猎狮/犀牛/雄鹿等

sentences.chinese: 搜寻失踪儿童

sentences.chinese: 狼往往成群捕猎。

sentences.chinese: 皇帝进入朝廷时他们都向他鞠躬致敬。

sentences.chinese: 皇帝女儿不愁嫁。

sentences.chinese: 触犯了皇帝的老宰相被流放到遥远的边疆。

sentences.chinese: 12月2日，亨利六世加冕为王。

detailed_translations.chinese: 主要的，最重要的，最大的

name: sign
trans: n.标志;符号;告示牌;手势;征兆v.签名;做标记;

sentences.chinese: 美元符号

sentences.english: a minus sign
sentences.chinese: 减号

sentences.english: a sign on the door
sentences.chinese: 门上的标牌

sentences.english: Sign here, please.
sentences.chinese: 请在这里签字。

sentences.chinese: 从这里到波兰边界有40英里。

sentences.english: an area 50 miles wide and 150 miles long
sentences.chinese: 一片50英里宽、150英里长的地区

sentences.chinese: 我们大约走了半英里。

sentences.chinese: 他正以每小时70英里的速度驾车行驶。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring distance, equal to 1,760  yard s  or about 1,609 metres

sentences.english: He passes the ball with unerring accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 他传球准确无误。

sentences.english: They questioned the accuracy of the information in the file.
sentences.chinese: 他们怀疑档案中信息的正确性。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being exact or correct; the ability to do sth skilfully without making mistakes

sentences.english: precision engineering
sentences.chinese: 精密工程

sentences.english: precision bombing
sentences.chinese: 精确轰炸

detailed_translations.chinese: 精度，[数] 精密度；精确
detailed_translations.english: the quality of being very exact or correct
made or done in a very exact way

sentences.english: All consultations are by appointment only.
sentences.chinese: 就诊必须预约。

sentences.english: Other changes included the appointment of a new Foreign Minister.
sentences.chinese: 其他变动包括任命了一位新的外交部长。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement for a meeting at an agreed time and place, for a particular purpose

name: pleasant
trans: adj.令人愉快的;合意的;宜人的;

sentences.english: It had been a pleasant evening.
sentences.chinese: 那是个愉快的夜晚。

sentences.english: the pleasant climate of Southern California
sentences.chinese: 南加利福尼亚的宜人气候

sentences.english: The restaurant was large and pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅宽敞舒适。

sentences.english: Kate! What a pleasant surprise !
sentences.chinese: 凯特！真是让人惊喜！

detailed_translations.english: enjoyable or attractive and making you feel happy

name: steering
trans: n.转向;操纵;掌舵v.操纵;掌舵;“steer”的现在分词;

sentences.english: For more information on weight loss and healthy eating, visit our website.
sentences.chinese: 有关减肥和健康饮食的更多信息，请访问我们的网站。

detailed_translations.chinese: 网站（全球资讯网的主机站）
detailed_translations.english: a place on the Internet where you can find information about something, especially a particular organization

name: influence
trans: n.影响（力）;有影响的人或物v.影响;

sentences.english: He used his influence to get his son into medical school.
sentences.chinese: 他利用权势把儿子弄进了医学院。

sentences.english: He denies exerting any political influence over them.
sentences.chinese: 他否认曾向他们施加过政治影响。

detailed_translations.english: the power to make other people agree with your opinions or do what you want

name: instruct
trans: v.教授;教导;指示;命令;通知;

sentences.english: Eva went straight to the hotel, as instructed (= as she had been told ).
sentences.chinese: 伊娃按照指示径直去了宾馆。

sentences.english: Greater effort is needed to instruct children in road safety.
sentences.chinese: 在指导儿童注意道路安全方面需要更大的努力。

sentences.english: I was instructed that £20,000 had been paid into my account.
sentences.chinese: 我得到通知两万英镑已存入我的账户。

sentences.english: By comparison, one kilogram of tomatoes requires 160 litres of water.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，生产一公斤的番茄需要160升水。

sentences.english: For example, the kilogram scale allows you to assign a number to an object indicating its weight based upon standardized displacements of measuring instruments.
sentences.chinese: 例如，千克尺度允许您给一个物体分配数字，根据测量仪器的标准化的偏移量指示该物体的重量。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring weight, equal to 1,000 grams

sentences.english: bomb disposal experts
sentences.chinese: 拆弹专家

detailed_translations.english: when you get rid of something

sentences.english: illegal drugs
sentences.chinese: 违禁药品

sentences.english: They were involved in illegal activities.
sentences.chinese: 他们参与了非法活动。

detailed_translations.english: not allowed by the law

name: mine
trans: n.矿;地雷[代]我的（东西）v.采矿;埋地雷;

sentences.english: It was Glen’s idea, not mine.
sentences.chinese: 这是格伦的主意，不是我的。

sentences.english: ‘Is that your car?’ ‘No, mine is parked over the road.’
sentences.chinese: “那是你的车吗？”“不是，我的车停在路对面。”

sentences.english: You’ve got good legs – mine are too thin.
sentences.chinese: 你的腿很美——我的腿太细了。

sentences.english: His English is better than mine.
sentences.chinese: 他英语比我好。

name: television
trans: n.电视机;电视节目;电视行业;

sentences.english: Lucy turned on the television to watch the evening news.
sentences.chinese: 露西打开电视收看晚间新闻。

sentences.english: They have a television in every room.
sentences.chinese: 他们每个房间都配有电视。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electronic equipment shaped like a box with a screen, on which you can watch programmes
